name: Shield Breaker

grantsPowers.name: Dispel
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Cancel and Punish Barrier Users

grantsPowers.name: Shield Breaker
grantsPowers.description: Attack: Cancel and Punish Block and Parry

grantsPowers.name: Rupture Barrier
grantsPowers.description: Passive: Increase Damage vs Barriers; Gain Resource

description: A shield is a mighty piece of weaponry and armor that is often difficult to bypass, but a Shield Breaker has the ability to plow through such armament with ease. Breaking barriers and exposing weakness are just a few attributes they are privy to, adding another layer of complexity to combat.
lore: Why avoid a barrier when you can break through it?
